description: Detects use of an encoded/obfuscated version of an IP address (hex, octal...) in an URL combined with a download command
name: Obfuscated IP Download
query: (process.command_line.text:(*Invoke\-WebRequest* OR *iwr\ * OR *wget\ * OR *curl\ * OR *DownloadFile* OR *DownloadString*) AND (process.command_line.text:(*\/\/0x* OR *.0x* OR *.00x*) OR (process.command_line.text:*http\:\/\/%* AND process.command_line.text:*%2e*)))
author: Florian Roth
